text:
Lawrence Paul "Lightning" Libertore, Jr. (November 18, 1939 – December 25, 2017) was an American college football player and later Lakeland, Florida real-estate agent as well as a state legislator as a Democrat. He was born in Canton, Ohio. He played for the Florida from 1960 through 1962.
Larry served as a Florida State Representative from 1970 to 1974.
Libertore died on December 25, 2017 of an aortic aneurysm in Lakeland, Florida at the age of 78.
